game.description: A mysterious cult has been secretly gathering in the nearby ruins, performing dark rituals to summon an ancient evil. You have been tasked with infiltrating the ruins and putting an end to their nefarious plans.
game.objective: Stop the cult's dark ritual and destroy the artifact they seek to summon.
game.quest_giver: Rumor has it that a local trader named Gorvoth knows more about the cult's plans than he lets on. You can find him at The Red Griffin Inn, located in the town of Willowdale.

tasks.description: Gather information from Gorvoth at The Red Griffin Inn
tasks.objective: Convince Gorvoth to share about the cult's plans

tasks.description: Infiltrate the ruins and gather intel on the cult's dark ritual
tasks.objective: Silently explore the ruins without detection

tasks.description: Destroy the artifact in the cult's summoning circle
tasks.location: Cult's Summoning Circle, heart of the ruins
tasks.objective: Neutralize the ritual artifact to end it
